You regain your footing and see the nose of the beast buried in the hull of your ship. It reverses its engines and slowly pulls itself out opening the hole to the sea.

In Salt & Iron you can reenact famous naval battles from the American Civil War right on your tabletop! 
These fast play rules are great for playing out any size battles in the matter of a couple hours.
 These can be casual games amongst friends or historical scenarios to see if history can be rewritten. 
What would have happened had Virginia destroyed Monitor, or if Monitor had even failed to arrive?

Every Civil War historian is very familiar with the great commanders such as David Farragut, Samuel Francis Du Pont, Franklin Buchanan, and Raphael Semmes. 
With Salt & Iron, you can put yourself on the deck with them commanding some of their famous ships, along with many others. 
There are many ships represented in Salt & Iron, plenty to take action in almost any scenario one can think up.

Now is the time Captain, prepare your fleet and lead daring actions against the enemy!

—description from the publisher

Name: On Your Mark!: A Think On Your Feet, Track Building Game
Description:
You are an aspiring Olympic athlete who is training for the next Summer Olympics. You have decided the best way to improve your endurance is to create the most obnoxious and grueling track ever conceived! The longer the track the more in shape you will be when the games begin!

Players will be competing to create the longest track by drafting three track cards at a time and building on to their starting card. Any track segment that results in a dead end will not count towards your total distance, so make sure to plan for a way back to the starting line! In addition to track segments, players will occasionally come across Resource Cards which can be used to purchase Exhaustion Cards which if used correctly can earn the player a huge bonus.

The game ends when the cards run out, tally up your distance using the included scorepad and the player with the longest track wins!

—description from the publisher

Name: Corona: Mit Eifer ins Geschäft
Description:
Compete to buy all the groceries on a shopping list for an elderly neighbour who is shielding against the virus.

The players collect and swap game cards, and the winner is whoever delivers all the items first. Hurdles along the way include encountering the virus, which sends you into quarantine, or finding that hoarders have already snapped up all the pasta or toilet rolls.

Name: Rule of Three
Description:
Rule of Three is a fast-paced strategy game for visual thinkers. Shuffle the cards and prepare to collect matching triplets of shapes, colors, and numbers. Can you outwit the other players and steal the cards they need?

In this game players score points by matching sets.  A matching set is any three cards that share two qualities from the following: Color, or Shape, or Number of Bars.   Wild cards are also part of the game, and enable you to form a set with cards sharing two qualities.

A round ends when a player has 3 matching sets, scoring them 3 points.  Players with 1 or 2 matching sets score -1 point, and players with no matching sets score -3 points.  The first player to score 10 points wins.

—description from the publisher

Name: Aqua Garden: Outdoor Expansion
Description:
In the Kickstarter-exclusive Outdoor Expansion for Aqua Garden, the player now has an additional tank, the Outdoor aquarium.

Each player will receive a unique meeple - either a whale, an orca, a dolphin or a sea lion - each having a unique ability, as well as a special outdoor tank. Once per round, the player has the option of placing a creature in the outdoor aquarium instead of the indoor ones, to either gain 2 funds or activate special abilities.

The Outdoor Expansion also adds a new type of advanced pieces: the Jellyfish, which counts as a joker fish piece to complete milestones.

Name: Aqua Garden: Kickstarter Rewards
Description:
This mini expansion, which is exclusive to the Kickstarter backers, introduces three different animals to the game: the Pufferfish, the Sunfish and the Japanese Spider Crab. Each allows the player to gain Victory Points in unique ways: 

     The Sunfish grants 2 Victory Points for each set of 3 funds you still have at the end of the game.
     The Pufferfish grants 1 Victory Point for each Coral token in the player's aquarium.
     The Japanese Spider Crab grants 1 Victory Point for each advanced fish token in the player's aquarium, itself included.


This pack also includes a unique Spotted Garden Eel meeple to replace the scoring marker cube from the base game.

Name: Admirals' War: World War II at Sea Expansion
Description: Admirals' War Expansion is a new expansion of the Admirals' War base game that incorporates the Black Sea, new submarine rules, Plan Orange scenarios, as well as three new counter-sheets full of new ships.

Name: Work From Home
Description:
WORK FROM HOME is a fast-paced, competitive card game that is full of distractions. The purpose of the game is to make the most money by completing your assigned work tasks; however, text messages, crying babies, and many other distractions make it tough to focus. WORK FROM HOME takes only 3 minutes to learn and 10 minutes to play, and is family-friendly fun for everyone.

Coming to Kickstarter March 2021.

Name: Aquatica: Raum the Cruel & Nerine the Law Keeper Promo Cards
Description:
2 promo cards that introduce new King cards to Aquatica. Originally given away at SPIEL 19 and other conventions. Later available during the Game Boy Geek Season 10 Kickstarter campaign.

9 - Raum the Cruel: Conquer 1 location and raise it all up.

10 - Nerine the Law Keeper: Copy the effect of the upper card from any other player's discard.

Name: DC Comics HeroClix: Wonder Woman 80th Anniversary Miniatures Game
Description:
Standalone awesomeness! Play up to 8 campaign scenarios for 2 players where results matter from session to session or sit down for a head to head single match of raw power! Each of the 10 beautiful ready to play figures comes with two different ways to play for hundreds of different combinations. Excellent point of entry for the first time miniatures player! Map components are thick double sided and the box includes everything you need to play!

This miniatures game contains everything 2 people need to play HeroClix:

A meaty multi-session campaign for 2 players that pivots and turns based on the results of the last session
10 Premium Quality Pre-Painted Miniatures each with TWO ways to play for beginner or advanced play
20 Character Cards
18 Object, Terrain, and Bystander tokens
6 Double-Sided Thick Map Tiles. No folds!
2 Custom Wonder Woman six-sided dice
2 All-new Powers and Abilities Cards with Wonder Woman imagery
1 All-New Full-Color HeroClix Core Rulebook (2021 edition)
This boxed-set is a great way for 2 players to learn HeroClix! Existing players will definitely want to pick up this product since it includes tournament-worthy figures as well as an updated Rulebook and Powers and Abilities Card available for the first time ever!

Wonder Woman is the Champion of Themyscira, one of the strongest people on Earth, hero to all Amazons, and a connection between Gods and mortals. What perils will face her on the HeroClix tabletop?!

—description from the publisher

Name: Fort mit Schaden!
Description:
The players start on space 1 and have to get to space 120 to win the game. Movement is determined by a die. One some spaces events hinder or benefit the players. Players who can recite the matching verse about damage prevention avoid the penalty and get a reward instead.

The game was published in accordance with the "Reichsarbeitsgemeinschaft Schadensverhütung" between 1936 and 1944.

Name: Chronicles of Crime: Tantrum House 2020 Promo Card
Description:
Available from Tantrum House Season 7 2020 Kickstarter Campaign.

Adds a new suspect based on Tantrum's House Melissa Delp for missions in Chronicles of Crime.

Name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Warcry – Khainite Shadowstalkers
Description:
The Daughters of Khaine are a fearsome cult that exults in the spilling of fresh blood. Honouring the Lord of Murder, these aelven warriors fight to fulfil the aims of their true mistress, the Shadow Queen Morathi.

Emerge from the shadows to cut down those who would oppose the will of Morathi with the Khainite Shadowstalkers! This warband set allows you to field these aelven killers in your battles, containing:


     9 multipart plastic Khainite Shadowstalkers miniatures – 1 Shroud Queen/Shroudblade, 4 Shroudblades with Cursed Swords, 1 Shroudblade with Umbral Spear, 1 Slaughtershade, and 2 Darkflame Warlocks
     A Khainite Shadowstalkers abilities card, allowing you to unleash the distinctive and deadly battle tactics of this warband in your games
     7 fighter cards for seeing your rules at a glance, plus divider cards for tracking your tokens


What’s more, these deadly warriors are available for use in your Daughters of Khaine Warhammer Age of Sigmar army thanks to a free warscroll available in the Downloads tab.

This set is supplied with 1x Citadel 40mm Round Base and 9x Citadel 28.5mm Round Bases.

—description from the publisher

Name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Warcry – Agents of Chaos
Description:
The warriors who pledge themselves to the Dark Gods flock to the Eightpoints like their own promised land. Here, they seek to prove themselves – to conquer, raise their foul offerings, and revel in slaughter. Myriad howling beasts and bloodthirsty Daemons are never far behind, eager to catch the eye of the gods and earn infernal glory.

Agents of Chaos is the essential guide to commanding the forces of Grand Alliance: Chaos in games of Warcry. Nineteen warbands are detailed in full, from festering Maggotkin of Nurgle to vicious skaven. You’ll find loads of new fighter cards, background tables, Fated Quests, and Challenge Battles – in short, everything you need to play the forces of Chaos in full campaigns.

Inside, you’ll find:


     Full rules for the following warbands: Beasts of Chaos, Blades of Khorne: Daemons, Blades of Khorne: Bloodbound, Disciples of Tzeentch: Daemons, Disciples of Tzeentch: Arcanites, Maggotkin of Nurgle: Daemons, Maggotkin of Nurgle: Rotbringers, Hedonites of Slaanesh: Daemons, Hedonites of Slaanesh: Sybarites, Skaven, Slaves to Darkness, Iron Golem, Untamed Beasts, Corvus Cabal, Cypher Lords, The Unmade, Splintered Fang, Scions of the Flame, and Spire Tyrants.
     Fighter cards for nearly every model available to the Grand Alliance: Chaos ranges.
     Rules for three Chaos Allies: Fomoroid Crushers, Ogroid Myrmidons, and Mindstealer Sphiranxes.
     New rules for warbands with mixed Faction Runemarks under the same Grand Alliance and more than one Leader.
     Refined rules to include Monsters in your warband, as well as new abilities to use against them!
     Tables for warrior names, warband origins, and leader backgrounds.
     4 Chaos Fated Quests, including Spoils of Victory tables for both Honour and Glory.
     6 Chaos Challenge Battles, including special rules and valuable Spoils.


If you desire nothing more than bloodshed in the name of Chaos, this 112-page softback book is for you.

—description from the publisher

Name: Legendary: A Marvel Deck Building Game – Annihilation
Description:
A dark new threat has arrived with this Legendary expansion. Annihilus, Lord of the Negative Zone has declared war on anyone who crosses his path, causing heroes and villains to band together against this total annihilation. In defense of the universe, you might see former foes such as Fantastic Four team up with Galactus and his Heralds! It’s time for all to stand side by side against the incoming wave of destruction - stand together, or fall apart.

This is not a stand-alone game. A copy of Legendary: Marvel Deck Building Game is required to play.

—description from the publisher

Game Contents:
Rules insert and 100 cards:
• 5 Heroes (14 cards each — each Hero has 1 rare, 3 uncommons, 5 of one common, and 5 of another common)
• 2 New Villain Groups
• 2 New Masterminds
• 4 New Schemes

Name: Candycanes, Inc.
Description:
You and your fellow player are interns at Candycanes, Inc., tasked to build the best candy cane in time for the holidays.

Place striped cane bits to lengthen your candy cane, and gain a point for white stripes surrounded by red and green. Bows can be used to modify a card midway. Players alternate until either bows or cards run out. The player with the best score wins.

Name: The Spawn of Xichtul
Description:
The Children of Chaos are Here!

Chaos has made of Qaarra a wasteland. The unholy forces unleashed by the Drau Derleti – the Dark Elves – have brought the downfall of the Qaarran civilization. The few survivors have succumbed to the taint of chaos. Now warbands of mutant degenerates and bandits roam the wastelands in search of powerful magic and loot, trying to win the appreciation of their dark god Xichtul. Each warband worships a different aspect of the chaos god, but all are ready to kill and maim in his name.

This campaign for Advanced Song of Blades and Heroes includes 6 scenarios and all the rules and traits required to create chaotic bands. It is intended for 2 players.

This is NOT a stand alone book. In addition to this book, a copy of Advanced Song of Blades and Heroes is required to play.

—description from the publisher
Families: Series: Song of Blades and Heroes

Name: Banco Imobiliário: Rio De Janeiro
Description:
The classic game Banco Imobiliário from Estrela with the sights of Rio de Janeiro!

The objective of the Game Banco Imobiliário is to  become the richest player and the only one to not go bankrupt.

To start the Game, roll the dice and start the first round.
Play the dice and advance. 
When you land on an free property you can buy it and start your fortune.
Each time you roll the dice, you must fulfill which indicates the board. 
Watch out! You might go to prison if you fall on Go to detention and you will only leave there on bail. 
When you finish building houses and hotels, you must wait for a player to go bankrupt in order to buy his properties. 
To avoid bankruptcy , you can sell your properties to the Bank for half the price.

The big winner will be the only player who does not go bankrupt.
